name: CryptoPunks
intro: 10,000 unique collectible characters with proof of ownership
introduce: CryptoPunks are 10,000 unique collectible characters with proof of ownership stored on the Ethereum blockchain. The experimental project was inspired by the London punk scenes, the cyberpunk movement. The Cryptopunks are one of the earliest examples of a "Non-Fungible Token" on Ethereum, and were inspiration for the ERC-721 standard that powers most digital art and collectibles. The project was launched in June 2017 by the Larva Labs studio.
